claim: Climate change has caused a 20% decline in global crop yields over the past decade
canonical_claim: Global crop yields have declined by 20% due to climate change in the last 10 years

claim: Vitamin D deficiency increases respiratory infection risk by 3-4 times
canonical_claim: Vitamin D deficiency triples or quadruples the risk of respiratory infections

claim: Remote work saves companies $11,000 per employee annually in real estate costs
canonical_claim: Remote work reduces company costs by $11,000 per employee each year through saved office space

claim: Rising CO2 levels increase crop yields by 30% through photosynthesis enhancement
canonical_claim: Elevated CO2 levels boost crop photosynthesis and yields by 30%

claim: Remote work increases productivity by 20-30% due to reduced commuting and interruptions
canonical_claim: Remote work boosts productivity by 20-30% through less commuting time and fewer distractions

claim: 90% of hospitalized COVID-19 patients were Vitamin D deficient
canonical_claim: 90% of COVID-19 patients requiring hospitalization had Vitamin D deficiency

claim: Remote work has reduced US carbon emissions by 50 million tons annually
